job_purpose: To drive the continued success of Pozi's GIS platform through innovative front end development, clean code, and user-centric solutions.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Develop and maintain in house software and web applications
Build user interfaces for simplifying complex information
Provide advice and resolutions for complex issues
required_qualifications: Tertiary degree in Computer Science or Software Engineering
Minimum 5 years technical proficiency and experience
Ability to work well under pressure
preferred_qualifications: Experience with mapping frameworks like OpenLayers, Mapbox, or Leaflet
Experience with Geospatial web services and OGC web services
Previous experience with PHP CodeIgniter, Laravel, Python Django, Ruby on Rails
Knowledge of testing methodologies and CI/CD processes
Willingness to work on legacy code
Experience with Agile, Scrum, Authorisation, Authentication, and Observability Tools
Knowledge of Microsoft Azure and Amazon Web Services
company_details: Pozi is a web-based Geographic Information System (GIS) software company that aggregates data from various sources into a user-friendly mapping platform, enabling organizations to make data-driven decisions.
